title: Emma Wu
text:
I’m a Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) candidate at UC San Diego – Rady School of Management, expected to graduate in December 2025. I am passionate about leveraging data and analytics to drive actionable business insights.
With a background in Fashion Marketing and experience in statistical analysis, visualization, and machine learning, I aim to bring creative problem-solving and data-driven strategies to organizations across industries.

title: Emma Wu
text:

title: Emma Wu
text:
Experience




Data Analyst Internship MIRDC - Optical & Semiconductor Equipment Industry Office (Sep 2023 – June 2024)

As a data analysis intern at MIRDC, I worked on transforming raw information into actionable insights through statistical analysis. I built over 50 visualizations to support strategic decision-making and collaborated with cross-functional teams to address key business questions — contributing to a 10% improvement in project outcomes. I also supported bilingual communication (English/Mandarin) across 20+ client accounts, helping expand the international customer base by 10% and shortening project timelines by 15%.





Tutoring Assistant Qing-Xue Language & Science Learning School (Sep 2020 – Jun 2024)
